EmailTemplate.description: Use this to notify Customer the SPEX order was released
EmailTemplate.name: SPEX Order Released
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.CaseNumber}
Below order has been released.
Purchase Order Number: Sales Order Number:
You can track the shipping status of this order, and all of your orders, by visiting Honeywell's Order Status.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
